get.summary: Display a listing of the resource.

post.summary: Store a newly created resource in storage.

parameters.name: postback_url
parameters.description: Post back URL to post confirmation of payable install to affiliate API

parameters.name: postback_success
parameters.description: Phrase to search affiliates API response to confirm successful post back

parameters.name: company
parameters.description: Company name

parameters.name: salutation
parameters.description: Represents 1=MR, 2=MRS, 3=MS

parameters.name: firstname
parameters.description: First name

parameters.name: lastname
parameters.description: Last name

parameters.name: address1
parameters.description: Address 1

parameters.name: address2
parameters.description: Address 2

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City

parameters.name: state_id
parameters.description: State

parameters.name: province
parameters.description: Province

parameters.name: postal_code
parameters.description: Postal Code

parameters.name: country_id
parameters.description: Relates to countryuid in countries table

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Contact email address. Also used for notification of hitting volume caps

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of the affiliate, 0=inactive, 1=active

parameters.name: sub1_translate
parameters.description: Name to be used to post back sub1 value to affiliate network

parameters.name: sub2_translate
parameters.description: Name to be used to post back sub2 value to affiliate network

parameters.name: sub3_translate
parameters.description: Name to be used to post back sub3 value to affiliate network

parameters.name: sub4_translate
parameters.description: Name to be used to post back sub4 value to affiliate network

parameters.name: sub5_translate
parameters.description: Name to be used to post back sub5 value to affiliate network

parameters.name: sub6_translate
parameters.description: Name to be used to post back sub6 value to affiliate network

parameters.name: total_cap_email
parameters.description: 0=Do not email when total volume cap reached. 1=email when total volume cap reached

parameters.name: daily_cap_email
parameters.description: 0=Do not email when daily volume cap reached. 1=email when daily volume cap reached

parameters.name: dupe_pay
parameters.description: 0=Do not pay affiliate network on duplicate end user. 1=Pay affiliate network on duplicate end user

parameters.name: comments
parameters.description: General account comments

parameters.name: internal_account
parameters.description: Internal account

parameters.name: total_cap_email_internal
parameters.description: 0=Do not email when total volume cap reached. 1=email when total volume cap reached

parameters.name: daily_cap_email_internal
parameters.description: 0=Do not email when daily volume cap reached. 1=email when daily volume cap reached

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique record ID, to use as the affiliates unique identifier. Start first record at 12532

get.summary: Display a listing of the resource.

post.summary: Store a newly created resource in storage.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Descriptive title of campaign for internal use

parameters.name: affiliate_id
parameters.description: Affiliates UID related to the affiliateuid in affiliates table

parameters.name: redirect_link_id
parameters.description: Related to redirectlinkuid in redirectlinks table to enable redirects to appropriate marketplace

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Active in country IDs (JSON)

parameters.name: total_cap
parameters.description: Numeric quantity defining total volume cap, 9999999=unlimited

parameters.name: daily_cap
parameters.description: Numeric quantity defining daily volume cap, 9999999=unlimited

parameters.name: payment
parameters.description: Rate of pay-out to affiliate network

parameters.name: sub1_translate
parameters.description: Translation for sub1 name to affiliate network compatible name

parameters.name: sub2_translate
parameters.description: Translation for sub2 name to affiliate network compatible name

parameters.name: sub3_translate
parameters.description: Translation for sub3 name to affiliate network compatible name

parameters.name: sub4_translate
parameters.description: Translation for sub4 name to affiliate network compatible name

parameters.name: sub5_translate
parameters.description: Translation for sub5 name to affiliate network compatible name

parameters.name: sub6_translate
parameters.description: Translation for sub6 name to affiliate network compatible name

parameters.name: postback_url
parameters.description: Affiliate networks API post back URL to post confirmation of payable install

parameters.name: postback_success
parameters.description: Phrase to search for a successful post back response from affiliate API

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Flag for ability to switch offers on and off, 1=active, 0=inactive

parameters.name: total_cap_email
parameters.description: Flag to send email notification to affiliate network when total volume cap reached. 0=do not send, 1=send

parameters.name: total_cap_email_internal
parameters.description: Whether to send email internally within RM when total volume cap reached. 0=No, 1=Yes

parameters.name: daily_cap_email
parameters.description: Flag to send email notification to affiliate network when daily volume cap reached. 0=do not send, 1=send

parameters.name: daily_cap_email_internal
parameters.description: Whether to send email internally within RM when daily volume cap reached. 0=No, 1=Yes

parameters.name: dupe_pay
parameters.description: 0=do not pay affiliate network on duplicate end user.1=pay affiliate network on duplicate end user.

parameters.name: install_counter
parameters.description: Counts payable delivered installs

parameters.name: payout_type
parameters.description: Pay on install or full registration, 1=install, 2=full registration

parameters.name: failover
parameters.description: Failover campaign, 0=false, 1=true

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the record (Start first record at 5326)
